short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go to your items' page, Copy/GRAB the links, go to Mailpac's site, copy each item's URL and paste to see final cost!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to find out just how much money you will be spending in total for each item (shipping fees, handling fess, Customs, Mailpac fees) without going back and forth between tabs and pages?

Steps:
1-Simply go to each of your desired Items' pages 
2-GRAB the link, do this for all the items you need
3-Go to the Mailpac site simply by clicking "Check Price Here". 
4-Click "COPY" for each item and paste it in the search engine and it will show you the grand price for each item!
